Pacifix nodded. "Very well, but I am not interested in learning how to
fight, I am intersted to learn how any other race lives however. If our
fighting style is what you desire, then so be it."

OOC: Okay everyone, the Autobots and Decepticons are in shambles with so
many people having disapeared. I want to know if anyone is interested in
taking Slag, Snarl or Swoop? Airly, I am assuming you still have Sludge.
